(* Distributed under the terms of the MIT license. *)
From MetaCoq Require Import utils Ast AstUtils Environment LiftSubst Universes.

Pretty printing

Section print_term.
  Context (Œ£ : global_env_ext).

  Fixpoint decompose_lam (t : term) (n : nat) : (list aname) * (list term) * term :=
    match n with
    | 0 => ([], [], t)
    | S n =>
      match t with
      | tLambda na A B => let (nAs, B) := decompose_lam B n in
                          let (ns, As) := nAs in
                          (na :: ns, A :: As, B)
      | _ => ([], [], t)
      end
    end.

  Definition is_fresh (Œì : list ident) (id : ident) :=
    List.forallb (fun id' => negb (ident_eq id id')) Œì.

  (* todo : duplicate in Environment ? *)
  Fixpoint lookup_env (Œ£ : global_env) (id : kername) : option global_decl :=
    match Œ£ with
    | nil => None
    | hd :: tl =>
      if eq_kername id hd.1 then Some hd.2
      else lookup_env tl id
    end.

  Definition lookup_ind_decl ind i :=
    match lookup_env Œ£ ind with
    | Some (InductiveDecl {| ind_bodies := l; ind_universes := uctx |}) =>
      match nth_error l i with
      | Some body => Some body
      | None => None
      end
    | _ => None
    end.

  Fixpoint name_from_term (t : term) :=
    match t with
    | tRel _ | tVar _ | tEvar _ _ => "H"
    | tSort s => "X"
    | tProd na b t => "f"
    | tLambda na b t => "f"
    | tLetIn na b _ t' => name_from_term t'
    | tApp f _ => name_from_term f
    | tConst c u => "x"
    | tInd (mkInd i k) u =>
      match lookup_ind_decl i k with
      | Some body => substring 0 1 (body.(ind_name))
      | None => "X"
      end
    | tInt _ => "i"
    | _ => "U"
    end.

  Definition fresh_id_from Œì n id :=
    let fix aux i :=
      match i with
      | 0 => id
      | S i' =>
        let id' := id ^ string_of_nat (n - i) in
        if is_fresh Œì id' then id'
        else aux i'
      end
    in aux n.

  Definition fresh_name (Œì : list ident) (na : name) (t : option term) : ident :=
    let id := match na with
              | nNamed id => id
              | nAnon => 
                match t with 
                | Some t => name_from_term t
                | None => "_"
                end
              end
    in
    if is_fresh Œì id then id
    else fresh_id_from Œì 10 id.

  Definition fix_context (m : mfixpoint term) : context :=
    List.rev (mapi (fun i d => vass d.(dname) (lift0 i d.(dtype))) m).
  
  Definition rename_decl (na : aname) (decl : context_decl) : context_decl :=
    {| decl_name := na;
       decl_type := decl_type decl;
       decl_body := decl_body decl |}.
  
  Definition build_return_context
             (ind : inductive)
             (oib : one_inductive_body)
             (pred : predicate term) : option context :=
    (* Decompose the type. It will contain parameters too, but at the end, which is ok. *)
    let '(Œì, _) := decompose_prod_assum [] (ind_type oib) in
    (* We have to skip the first name since that's the name of the inductive binder. *)
    let index_names := tl (pcontext pred) in
    match hd_error (pcontext pred) with
    | Some ind_binder_name =>
      Some (
          map (fun '(na, decl) => rename_decl na decl)
          (combine (tl (pcontext pred)) Œì)
          ,,
          vass ind_binder_name (mkApps (tInd ind (puinst pred)) (pparams pred)))
    | None => None
    end.

  Definition fresh_names (Œì : list ident) (Œì' : context) : list ident :=
    let fix aux Œìids Œì :=
        match Œì with
        | [] => Œìids
        | decl :: Œì => aux (fresh_name Œìids (binder_name (decl_name decl))
                                       (Some (decl_type decl)) :: Œìids)
                           Œì
        end in
    aux Œì (MCList.rev Œì').

  Definition print_defs (print_term : list ident -> bool -> term -> string)
             Œì
             (defs : mfixpoint term) :=
    let ctx' := fix_context defs in
    print_list (print_def (print_term Œì true) (print_term (fresh_names Œì ctx') true))
               (nl ^ " with ") defs.

  (* TODO: SPROP: we ignore relevance on printing, maybe add print config? *)
  Fixpoint print_term (Œì : list ident) (top : bool) (t : term) {struct t} :=
  match t with
  | tRel n =>
    match nth_error Œì n with
    | Some id => id
    | None => "UnboundRel(" ^ string_of_nat n ^ ")"
    end
  | tVar n => "Var(" ^ n ^ ")"
  | tEvar ev args => "Evar(" ^ string_of_nat ev ^ "[]" (* TODO *)  ^ ")"
  | tSort s => string_of_sort s
  | tCast c k t => parens top (print_term Œì true c ^ ":"  ^ print_term Œì true t)
  | tProd na dom codom =>
    let na' := (fresh_name Œì na.(binder_name) (Some dom)) in
    if (noccur_between 0 1 codom) then
      parens top
      (print_term Œì false dom ^ " ‚Üí " ^ print_term (na' :: Œì) true codom)
    else parens top
           ("‚àÄ " ^ na' ^ " : " ^
                     print_term Œì false dom ^ ", " ^ print_term (na' :: Œì) true codom)
  | tLambda na dom body =>
    let na' := (fresh_name Œì na.(binder_name) (Some dom)) in
    parens top ("fun " ^ na' ^ " : " ^ print_term Œì true dom
                                ^ " ‚áí " ^ print_term (na' :: Œì) true body)
  | tLetIn na def dom body =>
    let na' := (fresh_name Œì na.(binder_name) (Some dom)) in
    parens top ("let " ^ na' ^ " : " ^ print_term Œì true dom ^
                      " := " ^ print_term Œì true def ^ " in " ^ nl ^
                      print_term (na' :: Œì) true body)
  | tApp f l =>
    parens top (print_term Œì false f ^ " " ^ print_list (print_term Œì false) " " l)
  | tConst c u => string_of_kername c ^ print_universe_instance u
  | tInd (mkInd i k) u =>
    match lookup_ind_decl i k with
    | Some oib => oib.(ind_name) ^ print_universe_instance u
    | None =>
      "UnboundInd(" ^ string_of_inductive (mkInd i k) ^ "," ^ string_of_universe_instance u ^ ")"
    end
  | tConstruct (mkInd i k as ind) l u =>
    match lookup_ind_decl i k with
    | Some oib =>
      match nth_error oib.(ind_ctors) l with
      | Some cb => cb.(cstr_name) ^ print_universe_instance u
      | None =>
        "UnboundConstruct(" ^ string_of_inductive ind ^ "," ^ string_of_nat l ^ ","
                            ^ string_of_universe_instance u ^ ")"
      end
    | None =>
      "UnboundConstruct(" ^ string_of_inductive ind ^ "," ^ string_of_nat l ^ ","
                          ^ string_of_universe_instance u ^ ")"
    end
  | tCase {| ci_ind := mkInd mind i as ind; ci_npar := pars |} p t brs =>
    match lookup_ind_decl mind i with
    | Some oib =>
      match build_return_context ind oib p with
      | None =>
        "Case(" ^ string_of_inductive ind ^ "," ^ string_of_nat i ^ "," ^ string_of_term t ^ ","
                ^ string_of_predicate string_of_term p ^ "," ^ 
                string_of_list (pretty_string_of_branch string_of_term) brs ^ ")"

      | Some Œìret =>
        let Œìret := fresh_names Œì Œìret in
        let ret_binders := firstn #|pcontext p| Œìret in
        let (as_name, indices) := (hd "_" ret_binders, MCList.rev (tail ret_binders)) in
        let in_args := repeat "_" #|pparams p| ++ indices in
        let in_str := oib.(ind_name) ^ String.concat "" (map (fun a => " " ^ a) in_args) in

        let fix print_branch Œì names prbr {struct names} :=
            match names with
            | [] => "‚áí " ^ prbr Œì
            | na :: l =>
              let na' := (fresh_name Œì na.(binder_name) None) in
                na' ^ "  " ^ print_branch (na' :: Œì) l prbr
            end
        in

        let brs := map (fun br => print_branch Œì (List.rev br.(bcontext)) (fun Œì => print_term Œì true br.(bbody))) brs in
        let brs := combine brs oib.(ind_ctors) in
                              
        parens top ("match " ^ print_term Œì true t ^
                    " as " ^ as_name ^
                    " in " ^ in_str ^
                    " return " ^ print_term Œìret true (preturn p) ^
                    " with " ^ nl ^
                    print_list (fun '(b, cb) => cb.(cstr_name) ^ " " ^ b)
                    (nl ^ " | ") brs ^ nl ^ "end" ^ nl)
      end
    | None =>
      "Case(" ^ string_of_inductive ind ^ "," ^ string_of_nat i ^ "," ^ string_of_term t ^ ","
              ^ string_of_predicate string_of_term p ^ "," ^ 
              string_of_list (pretty_string_of_branch string_of_term) brs ^ ")"
    end
  | tProj (mkInd mind i as ind, pars, k) c =>
    match lookup_ind_decl mind i with
    | Some oib =>
      match nth_error oib.(ind_projs) k with
      | Some (na, _) => print_term Œì false c ^ ".(" ^ na ^ ")"
      | None =>
        "UnboundProj(" ^ string_of_inductive ind ^ "," ^ string_of_nat i ^ "," ^ string_of_nat k ^ ","
                       ^ print_term Œì true c ^ ")"
      end
    | None =>
      "UnboundProj(" ^ string_of_inductive ind ^ "," ^ string_of_nat i ^ "," ^ string_of_nat k ^ ","
                     ^ print_term Œì true c ^ ")"
    end


  | tFix l n =>
    parens top ("let fix " ^ print_defs print_term Œì l ^ nl ^
                          " in " ^ List.nth_default (string_of_nat n) (map (string_of_name ‚àò binder_name ‚àò dname) l) n)
  | tCoFix l n =>
    parens top ("let cofix " ^ print_defs print_term Œì l ^ nl ^
                              " in " ^ List.nth_default (string_of_nat n) (map (string_of_name ‚àò binder_name ‚àò dname) l) n)
  | tInt i => "Int(" ^ string_of_prim_int i ^ ")"
  | tFloat f => "Float(" ^ string_of_float f ^ ")"
  end.

End print_term.

Definition pr_context_decl (Œ£ : global_env_ext) Œì (c : context_decl) : ident * string :=
  match c with
  | {| decl_name := na; decl_type := ty; decl_body := None |} => 
    let na' := (fresh_name Œ£ Œì na.(binder_name) (Some ty)) in
    (na', ("(" ++ na' ++ " : " ++ print_term Œ£ Œì true ty ++ ")")%string)
  | {| decl_name := na; decl_type := ty; decl_body := Some b |} =>
    let na' := (fresh_name Œ£ Œì na.(binder_name) (Some ty)) in
    (na', ("(" ++ na' ++ " : " ++ print_term Œ£ Œì true ty ++ " := " ++
      print_term Œ£ Œì true b ++ ")")%string)
  end.

Fixpoint print_context Œ£ Œì Œî :=
  match Œî with
  | [] => (Œì, ""%string)
  | d :: decls => 
    let '(Œì, s) := print_context Œ£ Œì decls in
    let '(na, s') := pr_context_decl Œ£ Œì d in
    match decls with
    | [] => (na :: Œì, (s ++ s')%string)
    | _ => (na :: Œì, (s ++ " " ++ s')%string)
    end
  end.

Definition print_one_cstr Œ£ Œì (mib : mutual_inductive_body) (c : constructor_body) : string :=
  let '(Œìargs, s) := print_context Œ£ Œì c.(cstr_args) in
  c.(cstr_name) ++ " : " ++ s ++ "_" ++ print_list (print_term Œ£ Œìargs true) " " c.(cstr_indices).
  
Definition print_one_ind (short : bool) Œ£ Œì (mib : mutual_inductive_body) (oib : one_inductive_body) : string :=
  let '(Œìpars, spars) := print_context Œ£ Œì mib.(ind_params) in
  let '(Œìinds, sinds) := print_context Œ£ Œìpars oib.(ind_indices) in
  oib.(ind_name) ++ spars ++ sinds ++ print_term Œ£ Œìinds true (tSort oib.(ind_sort)) ++ ":=" ++ nl ++
  if short then "..."
  else print_list (print_one_cstr Œ£ Œìpars mib) nl oib.(ind_ctors).

Fixpoint print_env_aux (short : bool) (prefix : nat) (Œ£ : global_env) (acc : string) := 
  match prefix with 
  | 0 => match Œ£ with [] => acc | _ => ("..." ++ nl ++ acc)%string end
  | S n => 
  match Œ£ with
  | [] => acc
  | (kn, InductiveDecl mib) :: Œ£ => 
    let Œ£' := (Œ£, mib.(ind_universes)) in
    let names := fresh_names Œ£' [] (arities_context mib.(ind_bodies)) in
    print_env_aux short n Œ£
      ("Inductive " ++ 
       print_list (print_one_ind short Œ£' names mib) nl mib.(ind_bodies) ++ "." ++ 
       nl ++ acc)%string
  | (kn, ConstantDecl cb) :: Œ£ =>
    let Œ£' := (Œ£, cb.(cst_universes)) in
    print_env_aux short n Œ£
      ((match cb.(cst_body) with 
        | Some _ => "Definition "
        | None => "Axiom "
      end) ++ string_of_kername kn ++ " : " ++ print_term Œ£' nil true cb.(cst_type) ++
      match cb.(cst_body) with
      | Some b => 
        if short then ("..." ++ nl)%string
        else (" := " ++ nl ++ print_term Œ£' nil true b ++ "." ++ nl)
      | None => "."
      end ++ acc)%string
  end
  end.

Definition print_env (short : bool) (prefix : nat) Œ£ := print_env_aux short prefix Œ£ EmptyString.

Definition print_program (short : bool) (prefix : nat) (p : program) : string := 
  print_env short prefix (fst p) ++ nl ++
  print_term (empty_ext (fst p)) nil true (snd p).
